Was always super satisfying to complete the puzzles and difficult rooms. Worth every penny and then some!! | 操作手感顶级，音乐恰到好处，剧情流畅。还有瞬间复活带来的几乎为零死亡惩罚让人失败后的挫败感很小，跌倒了一次后就想立刻重新攀爬，以至于每一面结束后带来的正反馈很强。蔚蓝社区十分活跃，上百人合作完成的大型mod不仅有很多新的美术材料和机制，还有几十个小时的原创音乐。有很多作者设计但是官图没有用到的技巧都可以在mod图中学习使用，满足那些想要追求游戏上限的玩家。正是蔚蓝游戏本身足够优秀的底层结构才会吸引这么多的玩家创作质量高的mod，也是正是因为这些mod创作者让蔚蓝社区时至今日依旧充满活力。

К сожалению, не рекомендую я эту игру. Увы. Нет, я не могу сказать, что она плохая или отвратительно сделанная. Она достаточно весёлая (если у вас подходящее чувство юмора), приятно (хотя и специфически) нарисованная, в ней есть разумный геймплей и даже какой-никакой, но сюжет. Но...она просто скучная. Сначала, когда вы не понимаете ещё, как играть, то да, это вызывает интерес. К моменту же, когда вы поймёте механику, вам уже осточертеет однообразие битв и повторяющихся (на разных планетах-то!) событий. Вы будете делать раз за разом, в каждой галактике, одно и тоже. Персонажи на вид разные, а умений раз, два, да обчёлся. Никакой уникальности и реаграбельности. Даже первая часть была намного интереснее, на мой взгляд. Начинал два раза, но так и не полюбил эту игру. Жаль, жаль. 
До реиграбельности FTL (которую, по факту, она пародирует), ей как до Луны. | что-то про космос.

5.5小时单人通关普通难度。[h2]上乘之作。 [/h2] 

游戏的优点很多。配色好看，画面简洁，操作优雅，音效上头。用较多的图形而非文字来引导玩家，用还算循序渐进的关卡实现了合格的IPMT，系统简单而有深度，在我这里可以打8.5/10。推荐喜欢挑战自己的玩家（最好有同样喜欢挑战自己的朋友）来游玩。我最早是在和朋友玩switch的时候接触到这款游戏的，一起闯关相当开心。但不得不说在pc上体验更佳。

但是缺点也不得不提，有几个点让我非常恼火（虽然它们并不影响我对这款游戏的喜爱，但我一定要提）。

一、游戏初期掌握弹刀就可以让难度大幅下降，这本来是件好事，因为我是弹刀大师。但是弹刀的范围略小于其视觉表现的范围，在游戏后期对战箭头蛇尤为明显。其行为和吃豆人里的幽灵一样，会兵分多路追围堵截，并且会随机扭动，让弹刀严重失效，让我很不爽。[spoiler] 后来我学会了冲刺弹刀，绕圈打很好用 [/spoiler] 

二、游戏后期敌人引入大量随机行为，使得过关难易度和熟练度非线性相关，极大增加挫败感。点名第八章boss。并且后期相当一部分关卡就是堆砌敌人，没有目的地在空中腾挪，缺乏关卡设计感和明确固定解，约等于碰运气。这种时候就可以感觉到是在”挑战自我“，也就是给自己找罪受，而非在制作者的引导下愉快游戏。

三、令人又爱又恨的跳跃系统。本作角色可以进行一次跳跃和一次空中冲刺，冲刺在弹刀成功/碰到地面或粒子后可以重新充能。平台跳跃游戏中有个可以算跳跃宽容度的变量，大概是指角色在离开地面多少时间后仍可以进行跳跃。而本作作为难度较高的平台跳跃游戏，该宽容度相对来说太高了，很多时候明明已经离开了平台，在想要向下冲刺规避敌人的时候反而会进行一次毫无机动性的向上的初始跳跃，让人极为恼火。并且初始跳跃和冲刺之间存在一个较长的cd，以及在两个表面之间反复横跳时很容易按不出想要的冲刺而是被新的初始跳跃替代，这些特性都极大影响了角色的机动性。

四、竞赛模式中，在占点模式里使用小型地图还算不错，但是其他几个模式，尤其是夺旗模式严重感到地图狭小，游戏混乱。且重生自带的无敌在小图里面非常op，单挑的时候需要注意。

五、前面还说IPMT做得好，但是最后一关的BOSS战居然给出了从来没有见过的机制，追逐模式里面倒是也用到了，可是出现得未免也太突兀了。用摇杆控制射击方向，且该方向与人物移动方向共用，体验不算很好。

六、结合极简画风和配置寥寥的菜单，有时可以感受到制作者的一种傲慢——虽说这未必是坏事，就像早期的ios一样；但是当卡关时，尤其是前面所述的堆砌敌人的关卡时，真的让人只会无能狂怒。制作者也确实一点没考虑键鼠潜在的操作优势，甚至不给一个改键位的选项。

总的来说瑕不掩瑜，大家可以趁打折赶紧入手。我就是因为急着通关才发现这么多问题的，足见其上头程度。

向创造者复仇算是meta里不稀有也不少见的一类，而六角疑云就好在类型上百花齐放，颇为炫技，玩完就知道制作者必是游戏宅中的游戏宅
如果试想一下同世界观的其他知名制作人，那么宫崎英高会被被抛弃的国王密令主角追着打，zun得和雪藏的旧作几十号角色打弹幕战，巧舟会被成步堂告上法庭……
总之，如果造物能有自己的意志，那么我很怀疑这世界上能否存在能和自己的造物友好相处的创造者，以及愿意和创造者和平相处的造物
抛开这些无厘头的脑洞，对老玩家来说，玩玩这种老游戏宅做的游戏还是挺感动的，虽然我不知道自己能不能算 | 总评：好游戏，依然有改进的空间，7/10

相比于Pony Island，这部游戏的质量以及剧情要好得多，解密的难度恰到好处，而且以六个看似毫不相关但却以一种剧情蒙太奇的手法将故事和谐的串联在一起，而且每一章节基本上演示了现代游戏的几种大类型的玩法，确实相当有意思，好评👍。

但是其缺点也是明显的，游戏总体大约3-4个小时，前2.5个小时故事的暗线没被挖出来时相对无聊，谜语人也让人烦躁。总体来说，故事的剧情不算有深度，而且有一些虎头蛇尾，只有某些转场部分能让人有眼前一亮的感觉。

佩服作者的脑洞，有兴趣的可以购入，打折买不会觉得亏。 | [h1]第一遍游玩这个游戏强烈不建议观看攻略！[/h1]
糅合了多种游戏玩法的Meta类游戏，层层嵌套，结局多次反转。
很难想象Daniel能在18年开发出这么超前的作品。
另外在我看来，这个游戏的剧情也或多或少的渗透了对游戏产业的思考，不知道是不是管中窥豹，但确实对我个人来说震撼比较大。 | The Hex is an incredibly ambitious and unique game by famed indie developer Daniel Mullins. They produce games known for their complex meta narratives, fourth wall breaking and unexpected game play twists, and The Hex is no exception to this. Especially the latter is extremely present in this case: far from a singular gaming experience, this is a combination of wildly varying genres and tropes, stringed together by a complex non-linear narrative with multiple twists and turns. There are moments when it almost becomes a study of game genres and techniques, nudging the player to question their preconceived notions of game design. The story itself is thrilling, strange and even flirts with horror at times.

Due to the sheer scale of this project, the individual quality of each new game play section isn't necessarily always up to the same high standard. Moreover, there are slight pacing issues as some parts last longer than they need to.

These sporadic quality and pacing problems aside, The Hex is still a wonderful and captivating experience, filled to the brim with wild ideas.

9/10 | 相较于其他的有meta元素的游戏实在逊色，要么有精妙的构思，要么至少让游戏性充足，这款游戏的确差强人意，但如果抛下个人的要求的话，这款游戏当作甜品游玩还是不错的

豪玩，大概算是我的肉鸽启蒙之作，17块那阵入的手，不知不觉已经断断续续玩了将近200小时了。。内容很丰富，可能比起以撒那种稍有不足，但是玩起来爽就够了，基米！ | 很别致的肉鸽游戏！无论是完成纯战斗类的射击肉鸽的还是偏策略的通关方法都很有意思。每换一个角色就有全新的体验。但对于策略类的角色单人玩容错挺低的，推荐大家找到好伙伴一起玩，游戏性upup | I really wanted to like this game and had high hopes, the premise seemed cool and I was inspired by the upcoming Streets of Rogue 2. Unfortunately this game did not deliver for me.

I found the core gameplay to be quite limited and boring. Essentially all you do is one of two things in this game, either 1) retrieve an item or  2) beat someone up. There's other mechanisms to attempt to make things more challenging or interesting but they fall short, for example there's locked door or security defense systems, but you can just easily blow up walls and get to the objective quite easily with little resistance. Even with random level generation it doesn't add much lasting value, as you still do the same objectives but with a slightly different level layout but without much added challenge.

The gamepad setup and multiplayer support really sucks, it's very difficult to setup multiple game pads and steam deck support is non existent. Menus require the use of a mouse to navigate, so not ideal with just a controller. It takes me at least 10-15 minutes to get 3 game pads synced up right. And then on multiplayer you all share the same game camera so you all have to stay close to each other. The game appeal wears off after like 20-30 minutes. The UI is very busy with lots of wording.

The level art design feels like you're in an underground subway and not in an open outdoor city environment. The level sizes are pretty small and limited. Personally I would have found the game a lot more appealing if it was more like GTA 2 with a larger city map and vehicles to drive and wide roads and going inside multi level buildings to complete one more challenging objective. Perhaps the enemy could try to flee and you all have to work together to chase or trap them. I think that 1-4 larger static maps would beat random small map genration for this type of game.

I'm hopeful for Streets of Rogue 2, but if it's too much like this one I don't think I'd buy that one if it has this same setup and limitations. | I can't just pick this game up and stop going run after run. Absolutely beautiful | A blast to the past, I rediscovered this game after going on a conquest to Windows XP theme my profile to which I discovered two sequels of game I played years back.

For those who played the first and didn't find the lessons taught in the first game to be satisfactory, the second game is merciful with different endings depending on how you interact with the two characters of the game.

I highly recommend playing this game over the course of days/weeks as it lets you sit on conversations and the memory game of prior correspondence with characters will feel more grounded to a reality-like situation.

Thoughts on the lessons compared between the first & second game, [b]Potential Spoilers beyond this point[/b]

[spoiler]The Lessons taught in this sequel are different compared to the first game. If you recall the first game all the tree branches led to the same root ending and there was no amount of multi-verse theory or time travelling that would change the course of the ending which taught a regrettable lesson about friendships that get complicated and regrettably deteriorate with no recourse or conversing that could undo a reality that is simply out of one's control. 

The second game doesn't have a single melancholy ending but rather several endings that seem to be pretty well written that consider the social dynamics between the conversations you have with the characters, and the repercussion of those words you say when they are gossiped between others and how it changes their perspective about you should those words happen to conflict and suddenly two versions of you exist in the minds of others. Beware, "Everybody talks".[/spoiler]

Otherwise I really enjoyed the game for the hyper 2007 immersion of the Old internet and the game could just about be played for that reason alone if you reminisce of the old days of the internet: when human beings on the internet were excited at the proposition of friendship, youtube was an innocent video sharing platform, and hip new social medias like facebook were all about connecting with others.

Yet another abandoned game that had great potential and would be great even today, except as usual
there are many game breaking bugs that were never fixed for 5+ years.
- Items randomly disappear
- Crafting an item fails; the end item poofs but you also lose the hard earned resources
- Nothing in the game seems to respawn and yet you're expected to survive not to mention the game touts
that it is built for multiple people; this makes it unsustainable for even 1 player
- Saves are randomly wiped
- Corruption of files between coop players
- Interface fails to update skills bought and forces a restart of the game
- Many "skills" don't actually function and were reported 3+ years ago from the date of this review
- No real precise or comprehensive information to find out things about the game; trial an error is the only
way and often is extremely obtuse.

Anyway, another bummer in the massive floating bummer pile. | The Wild Eight... Bom, por onde começar? The Wild Eight é um jogo de sobreviência e exploração hardcore situado nas regiões montanhosas do Alasca, cheias de perigo e mistérios. Explorar, craftar, coletar, sobreviver para viver fazem parte de The Wild Eight, esse último, mais do que você imagina, porque esse jogo não tem misericórdia de seus jogadores.

[b] - AUDIOVISUAL - [/b]

Vou abrir esse espaço já pra falar do visual do jogo, gráficos exuberantes, o jogo combina elementos em 3d Low Poly de jogos antigos com incríveis efeitos de luz, partículas, detalhes e objetos de jogos atuais, parece algo estranho mas esse jogo consegue colocar tudo isso sem perder em nada.
A arte do jogo é belíssima, HUD, menu principal, interface dos objetos (oficina, barraca, baú e afins) textos e artworks trabalhadas com amor e carinho pelos desenvolvedores e sobre o áudio eu não preciso falar muito, digo o mesmo que disse até agora. Belo e moral. A 8 Points está de parabéns por esse trabalho artístico e de áudio desse jogo.


[b] - HISTÓRIA - [/b] [spoiler] SPOILERS [/spoiler]

O desenrolar do jogo, a história ainda é meio complexa até onde eu cheguei eu não avancei muito porque tu gasta muito tempo sobrevivendo e explorando, como eu disse antes esse jogo não tem misericórdia de seus jogadores, mas até onde eu fui digo que me surpreendeu, eu pensei que esse jogo não teria uma campanha, pensei que era 8 pessoas no frio do Alasca e acabou, porém existe uma lore, por mais simples que seja, atrás dos personagens, existem missões secundárias, várias delas, embora eu não tenha conseguido ativar/conseguido nenhuma delas, as principais já me divertem bastante, achar uma antiga estação de rádio e descobrir que não há energia pra mandar algum sinal de socorro, sua missão agora é achar um gerador que esteja funcionando bem e assim ligar a energia na estação com o fim de receber o socorro, porém nada e tão simples assim, agora, precisa descobrir onde essa energia para.
Andando muito pelo mapa encontra-se um bunker aparentemente não militar porém bem escondido e trancado, dentro encontra-se uma pequena surpresa, surpresa essa que eu não irei contar, quero que vocês mesmos entrem lá e descubram do que se trata.

[b] - GAMEPLAY - [/b]

Pra tu morrer nesse jogo é um piscar de olhos, é um desafio e tanto prestar a atenção no jogo e ao mesmo tempo nos indicadores do HUD, seja de vida, fome e frio, se tu não ficar de olho nisso é certeza que vai se encontrar ferrado no pior momento para estar.
É um jogo difícil porém divertido e recompensador, ele pode te desafiar nas maneiras mais crueis mas tu se sente feliz e recopensado ao conseguir passar tais barreiras, jogadores da série Souls se sentirão bem-vindos a esse jogo, e como eu sou um, me sinto em casa.
Quatro locais estão diponíveis pro avião dar spawn e ah, tome cuidado com as nevascas (tempestades de neve, whatever) não subestime elas, elas diminuem sua temperatura muito rápido e também apagam fogueiras muito rápido (fornalhas não escapam dela, coisa que não faz sentido mas acho que irão arrumar no furuto).
O meu máximo de dias sobrevividos foram 27 dias no singleplayer e 12 no multiplayer, entrar em um mundo onde outros jogadores já pilharam tudo e gastaram quase todos os recursos do começo do mapa torna a sobrevivência bem mais difícil, então se tu quer um desafio, esperimente isso. E também para os jogadores mais casuais exite agora através da atualização 0.3.4 do Early Access porém o modo clássico seria o modo em que os devs desejam que o jogo seja, experimentem.

[b] - PERSONAGENS - [/b]

[i] Sobre os personagens, o que seria um jogo de sobrevivência sem os sobreviventes, não é mesmo? dentro do jogo atualmente possuímos 8 personagens como o nome do jogo sugere: 

[b] Anna [/b] (pessoalmente minha a favorita) - Uma estudante de medicina, Anna conhece mais sobre medicina do que todos os outros sobreviventes, sua passiva: Todos os medicamentos feitos por ela possuem o dobro de efetividade.

[b] Robin [/b] - Um jovem atleta praticante de Biatlo, Robin é o mais rápido dentre os sobreviventes, sua passiva: +5% de velocidade, +5% velocidade no ataque, +5% de dano dos ataques em longa distância, +10% de recuperação de stamina.

[b] Cole [/b] - Cole é o mais forte dentre os outro 7 e também possúi mais stamina, sua passiva: +10% de dano em arma brancas, +5% de recuperação de stamina.

[b] William [/b] - William é a melhor escolha pra jogadores novatos, ele sente menos frio e congela mais de vagar comparado aos outros sobreviventes e também recebe menos danos causados por ataques, sua passiva: +10% de defesa, +5 proteção contra o frio.

[b] Chang [/b] - Chang é o mais inteligente do grupo, isso faz com que ele consiga pontos de habilidades mais rápido que os outros jogadores e precise de menos para desbloquear Perks novos, sua passiva: -10% no custo para aprender novas skills.

[b] Vivian [/b] - Vivian é a mais sortuda do grupo, possuí grandes chances de dar critical hit e também sempre aparece com mais recursos que o normal, sua passiva: +5% de chance de dar critical hit (+10% se pegar de costas), 40% mais lenha obtidos no looting, 40% mais pedra obtidos no looting.

[b] Jeffrey [/b] - Jeffrey é um faz-tudo, todos os itens craftados por ele recebem 25% mais de durabilidade, sua passiva: 25% durabilidade de em itens criados por Jeffrey.

[b] Oliver [/b] - Oliver tem a mente de um empreendeor, sabe onde deve cortar sem alterar a qualidade do produto, sua passiva: -10% de perda em construções, -10% de custo de criação de craftings (itens básicos). [/i]


[b] - SISTEMAS - [/b]

Dentro do jogo existe um sistema de Perks e ele foi bem feito e bem equilibrado ao meu ver pelo menos, eu joguei umas 6 horas seguidas sem saber desse sistema pois o jogo não te avisa de nada, a Perk List fica na barraca do jogador e a cada nível de upgrade mais Perks são liberados ao jogador, os Perks são divididos em classes: [i] Caça, Mobilidade, Ataque, Defesa e Coleta (Hunting, Mobility, Offense, Defense e Gathering). [/i]

Pra conseguir os Perks o jogador precisa de pontos de habilidade que são específicos para cada classe de Perk, pontos esses que são adquiridos fazendo atividades dessas classes, se tu é um jogador que anda bastante, tu terá mais pontos de mobilidade para gastar em Perks, se tu é um jogador que caça bastante terá mais pontos para gastar em Perks de caça e por aí vai com todas as classes, por isso acho um sistema simples e bem feito, pois tu não ganha pontos de habilidades por passar de nível assim podendo upar em qualquer classe de Perks, tu precisa de pontos para cada classe exclusivamente, assim força o jogador a fazer tal tarefa para conseguir pontos pra aquela classe de Perks, e acredite, esse jogo tu vai fazer um pouco de tudo, ainda mais se tu tiver jogando sozinho.

O sistema de crafting é bem simples, com madeira e pedra o se constrói uma Oficina e lá o jogador consegue criar ferramentas que irão ajudar na sobrevivência, pedaço de pau, machados, picaretas, arcos, garras, lanças e afins ajudam o jogador seja na caça, coleta de madeira, pedra ou outros materiais, e assim como a cabana, upando o nível da oficina se libera mais itens para o crafting.

[b] - FINAL - [/b]

The Wild Eight é um jogo divertidíssimo e cruel em alguns aspectos porém o recomendo a todos que amam esse estilo de jogo, lembre-se que esse jogo está em Early Access então bugs podem ocorrer a todo momento, porém nada que atrapalhe a jogatina, até agora.
E é isso! Esse jogo ainda tem uma longa jornada pela frente até chegar em toda a sua glória, porém é um jogo muito divertido, e se tu curte jogos no estilo sobrevivência hardcore como The Long Dark e outros tipos ou nunca jogou um jogo nesse estilo, te recomendo fortemente a jogar esse jogo.

[b] 10/10 Keep up the good work, 8 Points (y) [/b] | [h1]Ne vous fiez pas aux commentaires négatifs.[/h1]

[b][i][u]Le jeu n'est pas déséquilibré[/u][/i][/b]

[i]Faim[/i][list]
[*] Chasser un cerf / sanglier / loup -> nourriture pour 2 jours.
[*] Manger 4-5 champignons permet de tenir une journée (pas 50 -_-').
[*] Il y a souvent de la nourriture dans les structures/bâtiments.
[*] Après quelques heures de jeu, vous souhaiterez pouvoir transporter un frigo tellement vous aurez de nourriture.
[/list] 
[i]Craft/durabilité[/i][list]
[*] Il ne faut pas des quantités astronomiques de ressources pour crafter des objets ou améliorer vos installations.
[*] Les équipements ne s'usent pas en une journée ou après 50 mètres.
[/list]
[b][i][u]Early access[/u][/i][/b]
[list]
[*] Le jeu est stable, je n'ai eu aucun crash sur plusieurs heures en solo.
[*] Le jeu à l'air bien complet, après plusieurs heures, je n'ai toujours pas fait la "première quête" (suivre les lignes haute tension).
[/list]
[u][b][i]Gameplay[/i][/b][/u] 
[list]
[*] En résumé, "Dont starve" like dans l'univers de "The long dark". Je n'ai pas aimé ce dernier mais, The Wild Eight me plait bien :D
[*] 8 persos jouables avec différentes stats (+10% défense, collecte 40% de ressources supplémentaires, etc). 
[*] On gagne de l'xp par type d'activités (collecte, mobilité, chasse, attaque, défense) -> 5 jauges d'xp différentes.
[*] Une fois qu'on a assez d'xp, on gagne 1 point de compétence à utiliser dans sa catégorie. 
[*] Le jeu n'est pas orienté "construction de base", on embarque sa tente et son établi qu'on peut améliorer jusqu’au lvl 5 et on campe en cas de besoin.
[*] En cas de mort, on perd les améliorations du perso + tente/établi et on réapparaît au point de départ. Nos objets reste sur le sol et on peut allez les récupérer. Les objets stockés dans des coffres perso seront toujours là.
[*] Il y a une quête principale (succession d'objectifs) et des quêtes annexes.
[/list]
[u][b][i]Pour l'instant, on ne peut pas changer les contrôles du jeu (QWERTY par défaut)[/i][/b][/u]

J'utilise AutoHotkey pour personnaliser les touches avec le petit script suivant:
[code]
; ----- Keys remap to play The Wild Eight ----- 
space::LButton  ; Makes the space key produce Left mouse button. 
CapsLock::LShift ; CAPSLOCK->LSHIFT (RUN)
z::w ; Z->W (TOP)
q::a ; Q->A (LEFT)
a::q ; A->Q (ROTATE)
; -----------------------------------------------
[/code]
[u][b][i]Jeu disponible en français[/i][/b][/u]
[u][b][i]L'interface est épurée et ne présente aucun problème[/i][/b][/u]

Sur ce, je vous recommande ce jeu bien sympathique qui vaut ces 20 euros selon moi. Bon amusement amis joueurs :D et si vous cherchez un compagnon de survie pour jouer en [b]coop[/b], rejoignez le groupe steam "[b][i]The Wild Eight FR[/i][/b]" à la page suivante:

[u][i]http://steamcommunity.com/groups/w8fr[/i][/u] :D. | まだシングルプレイしかやっていませんが、実にグッドです。

動物とタイマン張ると殴り負け、勝てそうになっても彼らは残り僅かな体力を振り絞り逃走します。
動物が狩れないので残り少ない缶詰と僅かなベリーとキノコで飢えをしのぐことになるでしょう。
飢えをしのいでいるとすぐに寒さに耐えられなくなり暖を取ろうとするも、すぐ消えてしまうキャンプファイアに翻弄され、木を切り続けることしかできなくなるでしょう。
そうして缶詰がなくなり、自らは何も成長することもなく、拠点の発展も近くの探索もできずに、徐々に衰弱し、あなたは死んでいくのです。

ファーストプレイはこんな感じでしたが、拠点をアップグレードすると装備が充実したり、罠が強化されたり、だんだんと生活が楽になっていきます。
最初は動物を狩るのがとても大変ですが、罠を上手く使えば簡単に狼にも勝てます。
死んだら全てリセットというわけでなく、一部引継ぎでリスポーンするのでハードなゲームではないと思います。

オンラインCoop対応らしいのでこれを友達と協力プレイするのは楽しいはずです。
よかったら仲良く飛行機墜落事故に巻き込まれ、遭難してみてください。

还可以，3.6内推荐入库。

 | A chill and long factory building game on a massive hand-crafted world, resource nodes are inifinite and only you can destroy/desconstruct your buildings; so you can take your time in building big and beautiful factories around them, as there are plenty of customization options to make some striking architechture.

Making sure you build with verticality in mind and also in spaces that are bigger than you expect to use is important.

There's a blueprinter building that allows you to create blueprints but only within the constraints of the building. Which can force you to think modularly and vertically which is nice, however i feel you get this tool later than you'd want to, and upgrades to it you also unlock later than what you'd want, and by that time it doesnt give you enough space to even create a neat modular blueprint with newer bigger buildings, and also by the time you unlock its final upgrade you might not even need it anymore | Satisfactory, как и многие игры-песочницы с элементами стратегии и управления ресурсами, развивает в мозгу несколько когнитивных функций:

Пространственное мышление:  Игроки должны планировать и оптимизировать расположение фабрик, транспортных линий и добывающих установок в трехмерном пространстве.  Это требует визуализации и планирования в нескольких измерениях.

Планирование и стратегическое мышление:  Успешное прохождение игры требует тщательного планирования.  Игроки должны прогнозировать потребности в ресурсах, разрабатывать эффективные производственные цепочки, и адаптироваться к изменяющимся условиям.

Решение проблем: Satisfactory постоянно бросает игрокам вызовы.  Нехватка ресурсов, сложности с транспортом, ошибки в дизайне фабрики – всё это требует креативного и логического подхода к решению проблем.

Управление ресурсами:  Игра учит эффективно управлять ограниченными ресурсами, оптимизировать производство и минимизировать потери.  Это полезный навык, который можно применять и в реальной жизни.

Многозадачность:  Игроки часто сталкиваются с необходимостью одновременно выполнять несколько задач: добывать ресурсы, строить, модернизировать фабрики, исследовать территорию.

Креативность и инновации: Satisfactory предоставляет игрокам значительную свободу в проектировании своих фабрик.  Игроки могут экспериментировать с различными подходами и находить креативные решения для оптимизации производства.

Навыки решения сложных задач:  Игра может потребовать много времени и усилий на поиск оптимальных решений для очень сложных логистических проблем, что развивает навыки поиска информации, экспериментального подхода и системного мышления.

Важно отметить, что развитие этих навыков зависит от индивидуального подхода к игре и уровня сложности, который игрок выбирает.  Игра не является заменой формального образования или профессиональной подготовки, но может служить эффективным дополнением к развитию когнитивных функций. | Por favor alguien debe detener la fabrica... Se que la insdustria no necesita expandirse, debe expandirse, pero ya basta, mi mundo se volvio un desastre nuclear en formacion. Ya no se donde empiezo yo y donde acaba la fabrica, todo son maquinas... | This game reminded me that im playing for straight 6 hours me thinking it has been only 1 hour is crayz xD

I knew this game had good potential when i saw it, years ago i purchased this game thinking this is gonna be a good game in the future and devs gave us just that. Now i can finally play full version of this game and have fun with people i love.

You basicly create otomized factory produce from basic to more complicated stuff,
Unlock Tiers and Build Space Station along the way,
Go around scout and discover interesting places,
Find out you can have arachnophobia mode ON, so that you can see png Cats "mewing" around xD
Progression feels good, Creating factory and having a feel good moment when you spend hours on something and it works perfectly thats the second you will be proud of yourself!

I will deff suggest this game if you're going to play coop it is much easier when you have someone with you.
Alone would make things much more slower in my opinion, more the better...

really struggled with the game first time trying; it was just me and my bf aand it was very hard to manage support/damage balance as a group of only two- we either went full damage and suffered on healing/buffing and died as a result; or either one of us would take up full support role and we'd still die due to insufficient party damage. 

it seems the sweet spot is to have a three people group; we had a friend join up recently and we're currently on our third map. been really fun. idk how it goes on hard mode but we're slowly getting there. [spoiler] game has its ass moments sometimes; you get f load of gold at the final objective- the campaign ends :D can't spend it or have it accumulate in some sort of other type of currency too...wow you're trolling your players!! how unique of you XD [/spoiler] | This is overall a fun game that's well executed, but decisions by the developers ruin the fun for me.

I really enjoyed this game to start, but it constantly kicks you in the nuts. Get a great weapon? It'll break on a critical botch. Fight a master thief? He'll steal all your character's gold and even if you kill him, you can't get it back. Get hit with an acid attack? It'll randomly destroy a piece of gear every other tick or so. 

If you've got a high tolerance for losing, maybe this won't be a deal breaker for you, but it was for me. This game warns you up front that your party will die, but I *wasn't* dying. I was doing great, I was just constantly losing my loot, which totally killed the fun for me. Games are supposed to be fun, so for that reason alone, I cannot recommend it.

Also the interface randomly stopped letting me access my inventory during combat, which meant I couldn't use my panaxes to cure the acid that was destroying my loot. Not sure if that was a bug or a game mechanic, but it was the final straw. If you're a loss tolerant player, this is still a good game, but if the idea of doing a quest for a sweet purple sword only to critically botch and have it get destroyed ON THE VERY FIRST USE (happened to me), then save your blood pressure and skip this game. | Вот они, Герои, которые спасут человечество:

-Выживалов 
-Чел который в первые ходы ловит страх и не участвует в битве | Good game for playing with friends.
Easy to understand, fun and with campaigns that can lasts hours (or just minutes if your team sucks) | 服务器恶心人，一直掉线

Game Name: Crown Champion: Legends of the Arena
Reviews:
[h2]Crown Champion: Legends of the Arena[/h2]

Has a total of [b]6[/b] trading cards.

Практически никем незамеченная игра, даже как-то жалко немного.

Это небольшое приключение часов на 6 если не особо соваться во все углы. У меня ушло ~11 часов по внутриигровому времени на зачистку 100%, что в целом не то чтобы много.

Сюжет довольно тривиален: у главной героини пробудились магические силы и её изгнали из деревни, потому что маги сейчас вне закона. Её подбирает община магов, даёт ей задания которые должен выполнять маг, но главный двигатель её обучения - это книга заклинаний. 
Во-первых, книга говорящая и объясняющая происходящее вокруг. А во-вторых, в ней мы собираем, изменяем и записываем различные комбинации того, что может помочь в бою или исследовании локаций. Также мы выбираем какие конкретно из этих заклинаний мы готовы использовать прямо сейчас.

В целом это своего рода Метроид, Магика и Нойта в одном флаконе. Не от всех этих игр было взятое лучшее, но по порядку:
[list]
    [*]Метроид - локации здесь зачастую имеют некоторые ограничения, снять которые можно только умением с другой локации. Почти всё время тебя зовут в одну конкретную локацию по сюжету, а во все остальные смысла соваться и так нет, потому что там будут ограничения, снимаемые именно умением с той локации куда тебя зовут. [spoiler] (Взрыв для пролома камней можно получить в ледяном пике, можете не обыскивать каждый угол до этого момента) [/spoiler]
    [*]Магика - на ходу собираешь себе свой же арсенал заклинаний, которые порой ведут себя... забавно. Как и в Магике, когда начинается бой, ты просто выкидываешь на поле боя то, что у тебя заготовлено, и по мере продвижения по игре от этого начинает происходить всё больший хаос. Иметь можно не более 4 типов готовых к применению заклинаний (удар, снаряд, земля, игрок - ЛКМ, ПКМ, шифт и пробел соответственно), однако прямо во время боя их можно совершенно без проблем в паузе заменить на другие или пересобрать. Тем самым нивелируется проблема противников с защитой от твоего любимого заклинания - просто поменяй его и вперёд.
    [*]Нойта - разнообразие кастуемых заклинаний и принцип их создания. Из самого простого - если к огненному шару присоединены руны "размер" и "серия", то будут выпускаться 3 крупных огненных шара, однако если соединить "размер" к огненному шару через руну "серия", то увеличится уже количество до 5, но не их размер. Главный ограничитель фантазии игрока - это что каждую руну можно использовать лишь раз в одном заклинании, а так же трата маны при использовании или триггере любого заклинания. Ах да, триггеры... 
[/list]
Помните, я писал выше, что заклинания можно записывать заранее? Руна-триггер - это способ активировать любое заклинание из книги, даже если оно не активно. Можно даже это же самое заклинание. Кинули огненый шар с авто-наведением и отскоком в противника - хорошо. А как на счёт того, чтобы при попадании вылетал ещё такой же? Секунд через 5 бедолага будет буквально покрыт сетью этих огненных шаров отскакивающих от него в него же (если будет ещё жив или соседи не переманят часть шаров на себя). А ещё у вас не будет маны на каст чего-либо, потому что думать надо, что выкидываешь на поле боя.

Конечно же, первые 40% игры у игрока попросту не так много рун, чтобы собрать что-то весёлое, с 40% по 70% как раз самое время развлекаться и экспериментировать, ну а последние 30%... Там открываются просто несправедливые механики замены стихии у разных типов заклинаний. Несправедливые они для игрока, потому что будь они доступны сразу или хотя бы в половину времени раньше - игра определённо стала бы в разы бодрее, забавнее и быстрее.

К сожалению, главный минус игры - это её затянутость. Локации большие, а телепорты стоят буквально лишь в трёх из них и более того, пользоваться можно только находясь на одном из них. В итоге бег по пересечённой местности без особых способов ускориться кроме рывка... Долго и не весело. Сглаживает эту проблему респавн врагов на каждом повороте, так что хотя бы не просто бежишь, а порой ещё откидываешься какими-нибудь заклинаниями.

Очевидно, любой игрок просто найдёт себе любимое заклинание и будет его спамить до конца игры с минимальными дополнениями, но к счастью тут встречаются комнаты испытаний, где нужно подобрать конкретную комбинацию и поведение заклинания, что даёт повод собрать себе в арсенал что-нибудь новенькое.

Отдельно хочу похвалить оптимизацию, несмотря на использование Юнити, проблем не возникало вообще ни разу, какое бы месиво ни творилось на экране. Звуковое сопровождение норм, озвучка нейтральная, а не английская, так что слова можно услышать только в катсценах.

Вот в общем-то и всё. Игра звёзд с неба не хватает, есть небольшие недочёты, но в целом достаточно хороша, чтобы пройти её хотя бы раз. | This was a fun little gem of a game. The puzzles were satisfying, and each spell you craft is like a little logic minigame. These things tickled my fancy in just the right way. | 难度相对友好，不管是解密还是战斗部分都是如此。游戏内最大卖点的法术组合虽然实际可用组合较少，但依旧趣味多样且在战斗中有一定灵活切换的需求和空间。收集部分如果不追求全收集，在游戏流程中也可以正常通过不必担心难度问题。 | It's an okay game, but definitely not worth the price tag. Если вам не хватает убийств для достижения "число зверства", советую открыть 2 фильм slayaway camp, открыть удаленные (новые) сцены, и зайти на третью, там вы быстро и с легкостью делаете 4 убийства, после прохождения сцены заходите снова на эту сцену, и так по кругу, пока не выполните достижения. На счет фарма монет (для достижений вам понадобится много), играйте в "смертельные лица", и старайтесь сделать как можно больше убийств, так как дают больше монет. Надеюсь кому-то был полезен.

Bought the game on a whim during the Steam Summer Sale, was amazed at how good it was after giving it a solid playthrough

[h1]Game overview[/h1]

In a nutshell, it's a business management game about turning slaves into gladiator champions, and you can play that angle pretty straight. It's not hard to achieve the basic goal of the game and win the championship with common sense choices, but the real meat of the game is taking what you've learned after beating it once and going for the "true" ending afterwards... then cranking up the difficulty after you're done that!

The important feature of the game, to either let the ai fight for you or take over a slave to fight as, gives this game appeal to different types of players. Fights are fun and varied, plenty of risk to take, and meaningful choices to make make this game a solid title. Hell, there's some "off-optimal" choices to make if you want to try goofy strategies.

[h1] Sound / Music [/h1]

Sounds do their job, but the game has a solid soundtrack. I find music to be important for games to set the mood, and the tracks do their job very well. Hell, I've added a couple of the songs to my own music collection! Well done.

[h1] Graphics [/h1]

Might be a turn off for those with "pixel fatigue", but they do their job, and are presentable. Most importantly, everything is clear and only becomes a problem in the big melees.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

Learning what to do off the bat is a bit of a challenge since the game doesn't hold your hand, but once you got the basics, managing the day to day is pretty straightfoward. Don't run out of resources, don't let your vets die, win as many fights as you can. You can look up a guide if you're having problems, but I recommend learning on your own, and don't be afraid of losing the game.

The management part of the game has enough meaningful choices to keep it interesting, though once you settle on on a strategy and know exactly what you want to achieve, it can be a bit of a drudgery. The events keep you from getting bored at least.

The battle themselves are simple and aren't paticullarly deep, but it can be fun to jump in as a fighter and go for it. Even better when you know combat tricks and go in as a stock standard slave with no gear and pull up a win anyways! 

[h1] Technical Issues and Asides [/h1]

Main ones I found are if you move a slave from one space to the next while paused in the management part of the game, you have to unpause before you can select it again. Kinda annoying if you're like me and like to sort your slaves by veterancy.

Another issue is slowdown during big fights, which can hitch the game and make multi-fighter fights a big death ball where everyone dies in 3 seconds. Careful with this one!

No other technical issues that were blatant. Pretty good game in this department overall.

Aside: there's an option to turn off the profanity in the crowd speech. I'm glad this was there, because I found the excessive profanity lines rather annoying to listen to.

The tone and humour in the game is spot on otherwise.

One more thing: there's cheese strats in the game for you to abuse, but that's ok because PRO GAMER MODE.

[h1] In Closing [/h1]

Game is very much worth the price point, even without the current Summer Sale. | Every single bug and feature complaint was fixed and patched since the release of this game.

The majority of Thumbs Downs currently are for bugs that are taken care of.

The game itself is immensely hard and has incredible replay value attached to it, coupled with interesting music and atmosphere that the game creates using events and urgency to make your gladiators the Best of the Best.

One of the easiest games to recommend to gamers due to enganging gameplay, magnificent dev support and high entertainment value. | 音乐真是倍儿棒啊！每次角斗士倒数计时的时候永远可以完美衔接，搭配场馆的欢呼和惊叹！可惜玩法有些单一，但是遇到next battle的音乐都能让人精神抖擞，

●良い点
・ゲームの雰囲気が良い

●悪い点
・ゲーム内での説明がほとんどなく、特にやり始めだとゲームが進行しているかどうかがわかりにくい(せめて1-2とか3-1とかそういう表記が欲しかった)
・ゲームの仕様上特定の装備が強く(というよりむしろ必須級)、更にゲーム開始時に解禁した装備から選ぶことができるため、状況にあわせて装備を変えるといったローグライク的楽しみがかなり薄い
・上記の理由により、敵を連続で倒すことでお金を得られるというメリットがあまりない
・1面後半(2面前半？)では消える足場を乗り継いで右に行く構成となっているが、下に行くと普通に道があるため、敵にほとんど関与せず素通りすることができるため、あまり意味を成していない(上で言及したようにお金を得られるメリットがあまりないことを考えると猶更)
・自動生成という都合上仕方なくはあるが、ステージ生成がたまにかなり理不尽なことがある
・被弾した時の無敵時間が短く、また足場に着地しないと復帰できないため、それが原因ではめ殺しされるとかなりストレスが溜まる

ゲーム自体がつまらないというわけではないためおすすめにするかどうか非常に迷いましたが、"おすすめしない"とさせていただきます。

I tried the game for a few minutes long ago. Apparently as i'm looking things up to write this, it was before the blueberry edition so idk how much it impacts my experience now and how much different the game was before. I don't remember much from the first time i booted up the game but i decided to give it a go again because... hell, my backlog is yelling at me from the background. So I can only speak of what i experienced as of playing today and i feel like it's enough for me. I don't feel like trying more.

So at first it's actually decent because it's a fresh experience after all. You're trying to figure out enemies, weapons and not (so just like in any game, i know) so dying will be a skill issue too. and i'm fine with that. Learning process, sure, I'm here for it if there's anything to learn. I really don't mind dying a lot as long as i feel like i can progress. I don't feel it about that game, sadly. But the more i played the more issues i had with the game itself.
Some hitboxes are questionable at times causing me to lose head when i don't think i should be (and sometimes things work just fine, the other time i do get hit).
Running out of ammo is rough especially when there's no aim ability.
Losing head will always be the death of me no matter what and I don't feel like I'm dying because of skill issue. And that feels really bad.
Oh and more often than not, enemies are right on top of my stuff (also plenty of my things end up usually being thrown into different highs (and sometimes you won't even see that) so good luck picking things up without dying too).
Sometimes visibility of the character is not quite there. it happened a few times that i had no idea where i am when enemies surrounded me and i was dying because of that too.
Some layouts/narrow corridors (especially going up) with specific mobs that will definitely hit me are annoying to navigate through without dying. Density more often than not with the combination of it is painful because you will most likely get hit.
Most enemies that i encountered are interesting. Some are annoying tho but as long as they're not packed with too high density, they are easily manageable. there's one type that i hated so far but it might be because of where i encounter them.

all in all, I had fun at first but as i tried to progress more... i got more annoyance from the game. i like the idea of it. I like that we can do combos but more often than not, issues above won't even allow for incredible combos. at least that's my experience and it doesn't seem fun at all. it's a shame because the game seems cool. i kinda feel like the pace of the game is supposed to be fast to get combos but at the same time playing fast doesn't seem like a reasonable option with low ammo management, all the possible hits and layouts that can force you to just kite enemies around one by one. seems... counter-intuitive? unless i got the wrong idea of the game.

btw music is great and i like the artstyle a lot. That's quality stuff right there and honestly for that reason alone it hurts me that i don't enjoy the game. if the gameplay was as enjoyable as the visual and sound side of the game, i'd definitely recommend it. | Musical art roguelike trip with a sweet story

Owlboy, como obra de arte, es una maravilla
Tiene un arte hermoso, un soundtrack maravilloso, personajes muy queribles y una MUY buena historia con momentos genuinamente sorprendentes por lo bien logrados que están
Es un trabajo de amor y pasión, que se disfruta de principio a fin en ese aspecto

Ahora, Owlboy, como videojuego, es bueno, pero molesto
No es un juego particularmente dificil, pero es frustrante de jugar
Las mecanicas son particulares, haciendo que el combate te exija un poco de pensamiento, pero generalmente se siente como si estuvieras peleando contra los controles
Apuntar con el joystick es un calvario, y muchas veces hay ocasiones que, por diseño de nivel o de enemigos, se recibe daño injustamente (cruzando de un area a otra, o siendo golpeado por un enemigo que esta dentro de un muro)
Recibir daño es muy molesto, ya que deja a Otus en un estado paralizado que puede extenderse aun mas si llegas a estar cerca de una pared, lo cual pasa muy a menudo
Para ser un juego cuya principal mecanica es el vuelo, los diseños son extremadamente estrechos, siendo incomodo de maniobrar en la mayoria de ocasiones
El juego tambien adora meterte en zonas con poca vision, lo que hace que muchas veces tengas que perder progreso por estar buscando a ciegas el camino
Tampoco ayuda que Otus no sea muy agil, y que la movilidad del personaje no mejore casi nada 
Es algo arcaico, aun para un juego de 2016, y se queda atras cuando se lo compara con otros plataformeros

Aun asi, es una muy linda historia que vale la pena experimentar una vez, solo por apreciar todo el trabajo artistico que tiene detras | Эта игра, тот самый алмаз который почему-то остался не замеченным.

Начиная от эстетики, атмосферы, музыки и динамики происходящего, поиграв в нее вряд ли получится забыть спустя года.

Поиграв спустя год с выпуска, на пиратке из-за студенческих сложностей.. я её давненько решил купить в итоге и в стиме сразу после прохождения.
И каждый раз вспоминая о ней, я с особым вдохновением и эмоциями мысленно прохожу секторы игры и боссов, анимации и особенно по локации Мезоса, а потом понимаю, что эта игра почему-то не так популярна как должна быть.

Хороша была бы популярность игре или нет уже решать каждому, но она очевидно заслуживает ощутимо большего.

- I tried playing this game with a controller since it is supported (so your mileage may vary), thinking this would be an easy shooter experience; no. Instead of making the joystick a swivel for aiming it acts like a mouse in the screenspace... very slowly, even on max settings. You are at an insane disadvantage aiming if you use controller, not to mention the controls are just... bad. Commanding your ally to do anything is a chore and wastes more time than if you yourself just went and did whatever you were planning to hand off. To top it off, you are limited on controller to how far you can see and aim, so in long hallways enemies have the upper hand against you as they can see you before you see them (This issue doesn't exist for M&K).

- Damage is randomized. You might live, you might die. Most the time it will be a 1 hit KO. I thought this was based on where hits were landing but it seems very clearly randomized as knife damage suffers the same effect as bullets, you might live you might not, max HP being 2 hits.

- Enemy AI are crack shots. Them having good aim isn't the problem, the problem is their reaction time and turning; example, open a door, the suspect has 2 objectives currently. 1, kill the civilian he was guarding, and 2, killing both cops that just opened the door. If a suspect is in attack mode (which is randomized when it starts, could be instantly, might never start) he can and will kill all 3 targets in a second or less with a rifle or pistol if they are all within line of sight, and they don't have to be at the same angle, as the AI will turn instantaneously and shoot when on target, instantly changing the frame its current target is dead. Enemy AI also have a randomized HP system like the player where you might kill them in 1 hit, you might not; it does lean more towards them dying in 1 hit however.

- While the enemy AI is busted, your AI teammate varies heavily moment to moment. He will either shoot them on sight before you even see the frame of a suspect lifting their weapon, or he will hear them shooting at him, missing because they are trying to shoot through a wall, and just do nothing. Sometimes an enemy will also run at him with a knife, and he'll just stand by. It varies so extremely it's like sometimes the AI just turns off and doesn't know what to do, running at a suspect aiming a gun at them and then dying from the inevitable barrage. It is either overly effective at dispatching enemies or worse than having nothing, as the teammate has no regard for what is between him and the enemy when firing; it is actively a larger threat to the civilians than suspects are. 

- Missions are bland, and when progressing some unlocks don't make sense; example, you get a fore-grip for a rifle before getting an actual rifle. Even if it is a stat boost for every weapon, the starting pistol has perfect accuracy as implied in its own description, making the unlock useless when first obtained. I didn't complete the entire game at the time of this review but 5 missions in and everything feels the same. It would be fine if I wasn't dying 10+ times per mission and the randomization of enemy placement didn't leave me unable to properly plan, but nothing feels different in any of these maps. Call it my skill if you want, but it's just boring considering how many times you will end up repeating it. It plays like Hotline Miami but worse. 

All in all, I can't help but compare this to other games and notice how much worse it is. Do I think the game is awful? No, but certainly not great. I bought it during a sale, and I think anyone else who is thinking of buying this should only go for it if it is under $10 bucks. | Играли с другом, 15 раз проходили первую миссию в сюжетной главе, поарали друг на друга поссорились, потом снова зашли и прошли с первого раза. Игра напоминает на hotline Miami но в коопе и за копов

[u]新颖的俯视射击类，给玩家的神经绷紧，注意力强迫集中，耐心渐渐瓦解，心态瞬间崩溃。[/u]
[b]故事剧情老套。[/b]
在局长第一次出来的时候，能猜出他是幕后黑手，只是没料到组织策划的恐怖行动是为了城市犯罪率的消失，甚至上面也在支持，不过步步为营一关关攻破阴谋的剧情倒是一款游戏该做的模样。
[b]玩法创意十足。[/b]
扮演人道主义反恐警察，面对嫌疑人需要先警告，在对面拔枪之前绝对不能开枪，使用枪托肘击成为游戏攻克难关的大部分方式。警察只有一条命，在解锁防弹衣之前特别容易被击杀，游戏需要极快的反应和判断能力，加上初次接触游戏的不熟练，道具不多且不会使用，导致前期难度很大。随着游戏的深入渐渐掌握技巧，利用窥镜确保获取房间信息，闪光弹面对威胁人质的嫌疑人或是距离较远数量较多敌人的房间，烟雾弹用以对付听到枪声涌过来的敌人，电击枪毫无疑问的神器，可惜弹药只有四个，其他主动道具不怎么使用，但以上几种使用得当就能“顺利”通关。
[b]游戏难度之大，是一场对精神和耐心的巨大考验[/b]
即便知道技巧，极低的容错率也会导致在即将胜利前翻车不得不从头再来。尤其是分数制关卡，多次失误会导致分数不够解锁下一关而重新启关的折磨。
另外，第二故事的最后一关有bug，在炸弹拆完后只剩两个房间时，突然什么武器都使用不了，也无法肘击，只能命令蠢蛋队友操作，结果可想而知。队友的存在就是扔道具，开门，档枪线，卡位置，偶尔能打出好操作，但千万不要把后背放心交给他。
[spoiler]至于是否推荐，我决定还是做个好人。[/spoiler]
以下是我自创的评分体系（10分满分）
艺术性4
游戏性8
创意性7
深度性6
社交性5
操作性6
剧情性5
总体评分6.5

You are limited in where you can go, sometimes you just need a bit of luck to be in the right time in the right place | The Sexy Brutale is a delightful puzzle game that you could crank out in 1-2 sessions of play. The game absolutely oozes personality through its music and atmosphere, really reinforcing the idea that the 12 hour time loop you find yourself in will continue over and over again until you do something to stop it, saving the guests one-by-one and unraveling the mystery behind the mansion. 

The gameplay isn't perfect, as I found myself desperately wanting a faster walking/animation speed as I backtracked through areas I'd already been to find the collectibles littered throughout the mansion. If you're a completionist, you might find it a little frustrating and tedious that there's no good in-game way to track exactly which collectibles you have and haven't found yet. 

However, The Sexy Brutale more than makes up for its few gameplay shortcomings by providing a captivating and powerful story that constantly illuminates past events as you uncover it.

Game Name: Learn Japanese To Survive! Katakana War
Reviews:
В сравнении с предыдущей игрой сделан ощутимый скачок вперёд - интерфейс удобнее, многие диалоги озвучены, введена прокачка отношений с персонажами, есть условный "данж" для фарма...
Ну а что касается самой подачи материала, то лучше для начала пройти предыдущую игру по хирагане, а уже потом браться за эту, иначе некоторые моменты будут непонятны. | The game is an improvement to the hiragana-game before.

Pro:
- party-system with 3 relationship-steps
- mixing katakana-symbols for preveous lessons in later areas with new katakana-symbols
- happy and good soundtrack
- nice art-style (pixel art + character pictures)
- optional: infinite-battle mode
- partial voice-acting
- stroke-animations when "answering" as a attack against monsters
- makes fun as a "game", not just as an "education game"
- as the hiragana-game: gets the job done of learning katakana

con:
- in the endgame/lategame there is no questioning of full words like in the hiragana-game
- little performance problems while running and while relationsship-events

Overall a fruitfull, relaxing and uplifting expierence. I had great fun and joy. | Learn Japanese To Survive! Katakana War is a turn based rpg educational game that uses katakana characters as the monsters with the player 'attacking' with the romaji or English sound of said katakana character. This game features a number of refinements over the Hiragana version.

One of the refinements in the katakana game over the hiragana game is menu layout is much better and easier to locate the command the player wishes to use laid out in a, i, u, e, o. Which greatly speeds up the player's ability to locate what they are looking for. Although at the time of this review (I'm at na, ni, nu, ne, no), I have not reached ya, yu, yo or wa, wo to figure out how the game handles them. I'd still prefer keyboard entries over the menu, but this game is not nearly as frustrating in menu navigation. 

Additionally, this game has the party members execute their 'attack' individually instead of the player forced to select all party member's actions before starting 'combat'. This change made the game quite fun for me. Even if I haven't reached any katakana characters i didn't already have memorized before playing. This alone is a huge improvement over the hiragana survive game.

The game also features swappable party members. Which actually had me wanting to grind/practice areas I've cleared. Not a bad thing in an educational game. The 'monster' encounters are done more like Zelda II instead of like Final Fantasy/Dragon Warrior if you know those NES games. And I found that to also be an excellent quality of life improvement. I could seek out harder or easier groups of katakana character monsters for more or less practice. Rather than them just sprung on me.

As mentioned, I've already familiarized myself with most katagana before starting to play this game. I would recommend prospective players to do the same. At the time of this review, I have hiragana memorized and about 75% of katakana. The game is more about reinforcing and finishing memorizing last little bit. I think using flashcard and spending time writing each character daily is still fundamental with the game as support in learning.

I actually couldn't recommend the hiragana game in this series. I found it a little too frustrating with too much time spent navigating menus to be effective even for support learning. However, this katakana game fixes enough of those issues as well as some things I didn't know I had an issue with for an enjoyable game. And in fact, there is a bit of traditional turn-based rpg here as well. The player needs to use party/monster turn order, character damage and monster hit points (katakana monsters  become more powerful further into the 'alphabet' you get) to dispatch them with minimal harm to your party.

I do recommend Learn Japanese To Survive! Katakana War. With the understanding the game is much more enjoyable if you study away from it. | Like Hiragana, this is definitely a decent tool to help you learn, while you practice at the beginning. It does fade off fast though and you will likely out pace the game. | Great tools to learn katakana just like the previous game but it got some improvment here and there
thank you for creating this game, make it easier for someone like me to learn japanese
ありがとうございます

เกมจับจังหวะที่ต้องใช้การทรงตัว โดยเราจะได้เล่นเป็นหน้ากากนักเต้นที่จะต้องคลิกซ้ายขวาเพื่อไปจับมือเต้นเรียงแถวกับคนอื่นๆ หน้าที่ของเราคือจะต้องไม่ทำให้คนทางซ้ายหรือขวามากกว่าทางใดทางหนึ่ง ไม่งั้นจะส่งผลเสียกับการทรงตัวและมีโอกาสแพ้ได้ ซึ่งระหว่างทางจะมีอุปสรรคที่ทำให้เกมเล่นยากขึ้น อย่างเช่น เกจทรงตัวเคลื่อนที่เร็วขึ้น เกจหายวับไปกับตา หรือจอขาวจนมองแทบไม่เห็นเข็มทรงตัวก็มี -- ด้วยความที่เป็นระบบการเล่นแบบเก็บคะแนนให้มากที่สุด มันจึงไม่ค่อยมีอะไรให้ทำมาก นอกจากระบบการเล่นเดิมๆที่เน้นเก็บเลเวลเพื่อปลดล็อกหน้ากากใหม่ๆที่ทำให้ทรงตัวดีกว่าเดิม และ Achievement ที่เก็บโคตรยาก และใครมันจะไปทำ อย่างเช่น เต้นให้ครบ 24 ชั่วโมง ผมหมายถึงเวลาจริงๆ ใครมันจะไปเสียเวลาเล่นทั้งวันกับเกมแบบนี้ นอกเสียแต่ว่าจะเล่นกับเพื่อนในโหมด Multiplayer ที่แข่งเก็บคนเต้นให้ครบ 25 คน หากฝ่ายใดฝ่ายหนึ่งพลาดก่อนเก็บครบ จะถูกปรับแพ้ทันที สรุปซื้อเอามาเล่นกับเพื่อนดีกว่า เล่นคนเดียวคงจะน่าเบื่อ เว้นเสียแต่จะชวนผีที่บ้านมาเล่น

I came back to this game after not playing for many years because of fond memories of the unique mechanics and the strategy.  I cant think of another game quite like this. 

I really enjoyed the problem solving, and scenario planning aspect of the game.  It is a ton of fun to play, once you figure it out, and this is where this game falls down, in guiding new players.  

I would highly recommend new players to not shun character guides and other online resources to get going.  This is a ten year old game and I think they purposefully designed the game around "discovery" mechanics (especially around character skill progression and item effects) so you learn by doing,  Which I think would be fine if you unlocked something that documented the information for you so if you step away for a few weeks you don't forget.  I find myself wasting resources to "find out" what something does only to have forgotten even later in the play through. 

Personally I think if this game underwent a UX/UI cleanup, slightly better tutorialization of some of the mechanics and better information persistance you could re-release this game today and it would attract a huge following. | Addictive, good looking, funny, rogue type game that makes you utilize brain and try it in different play modes.

9/10

The difficulty levels are a bit of satire “easy” is quite damn hard, it’s extremely challenging to finish the dungeon. Where as “too easy” is well, just that after you get the hang of things, still a fairly good challenge starting out and later on with the different launch pods you unlock after successful playthroughs. FIDS resources are the same as other endless games. If you enjoy resource management and tower defense you should love this. | Не цікава, не весела, цілком порожня гра із високим порогом входження. Я вважаю цю гру кращою за серію Civilization. Мені подобаються ігри в яких фракції значно відрізняються одна від іншої. Якщо у цивці у фракцій є невеличкі відмінності які виражені парою юнітів і перками, то тут у однієї можна переміщати цілі міста, інша тераформує місцевість під себе, а дехто взагалі нормально почуває себе тільки у воді. Але є тут і недоліки які властиві більшості ігр цього жанру. А саме - якщо ти починаєш вириватись вперед по технологіям, містам і оснащенню військ, то перемога тобі забезпечена і навряд станеться щось що завадить виграти. Тобто, в середині гри ти вже починаєш розуміти що ця партія вже виграна, а до досягнення мети залишилось кроків п'ятдесят і ти просто додушуєш цю катку.
   Дуже раджу всим любителям цивілоподібних ігор. На перших порах будете воювати з інтерфейсом, але як звикаєш, то розумієш що він все таки зручний. І, як на мене, він зрозуміліший ніж в тій же цивці. | This is the Big One. The best, most imaginative, and fun strategy game of its kind. 

A psychedelic diamond. | A社 (Amplitude Studios) 的無盡系列策略遊戲，包括《ENDLESS Space》1跟2、《無盡帝國》，這些遊戲能用的派系不多，但每個派系都很有特色，使用不同派系時，策略必須大幅改變，在這方面比《文明帝國》系列有趣，《文明帝國》系列加上DLC後有很多派系，但不同派系的差異較小，而且有不少派系的特徵比較平淡無趣。
A社是規模不大的獨立開發商，為了節省成本，A社遊戲的聲光效果比不上大作，例如無盡系列的派系領導，畫面和語音較簡陋，但A社擅長設計感，用設計感彌補成本劣勢，遊戲中的各種美術設計都很好看，音樂與音效也不錯。
A社的策略遊戲，有很多要素都是模仿《文明帝國》系列，但A社也有各種創新，例如無盡系列，比《文明帝國6》更早採用"城市區域系統"，也比《文明7》更早採用：地形高低差、改良設施不用工人。A社《HUMANKIND》可途中切換不同派系，《文明帝國7》也有採用，結果《文明帝國》越來越像A社遊戲，有城市區域系統、地形高低差、改良設施不用工人、可途中切換不同派系。
幾年前A社預告《HUMANKIND》的時候，我原本希望它能沿用無盡傳統：派系比《文明帝國》少、但更有特色，可惜A社走相反路線，《HUMANKIND》派系非常多，但都較沒特色。
在國際上，無盡系列的平均評價比《HUMANKIND》高很多，許多A社粉絲對《HUMANKIND》感到失望....
最近A社正在開發《無盡帝國2》，希望它的派系能像一代那樣特別 | Endless games are very fun. Really enjoyed this over something like Civ, and the storylines are all so unique and engaging. I'll also do my best to not spoil the game for anyone and be as comprehensive as possible.

  The plot is pretty straightforward and simple, but also enjoyable(the game is somewhat short,but it doesn't feel that way(if you catch my DRIFT(someone will get that))). The foreshadowing is well executed, where bits and pieces are scattered around the gimmicks/puzzles and narration. Speaking of puzzles, they're quite fun and immersive, although solving them is a bit of a mixed bag.

  My main criticism about this game is the progression, that being text input. At the start of the first episode, when accessing the pause menu, you are given some basic command prompts - those not being not the only one you can use. So I tried to find as many inputs as can(such as: "approach *that", "head to/towards", "inspect *that", "examine *that" and so on), which many are unresponsive. this isn't a big deal per say, but it proves annoying when you can't further the narrative with the command of choice - my point being that the way you express yourself and progress is somewhat limited.

  Overall, the story offers more than one would expect and it's worth giving it a try, even with it's minor flaws. | What a treat! For fans of text based adventures, it's a unique gem for its style breaking direction and expansive options that made me surprised over and over. O objetivo é simples: enquanto um time de bruxas se transforma em objetos e se esconde pelo cenário, o time de caçadores deve encontrar e capturar as bruxas antes que o tempo acabe.

A dinâmica do jogo é o grande atrativo: bruxas podem se transformar em uma variedade de objetos do ambiente, como caixas, árvores ou até pedras, o que torna a busca tanto desafiadora quanto engraçada. Os caçadores têm que usar suas habilidades para explorar o mapa e descobrir os disfarces, tornando cada partida única e cheia de momentos de tensão e surpresa.

A jogabilidade é divertida e rápida, com um ótimo ritmo que mantém a ação constante. A cooperação entre os jogadores de ambos os times é essencial para a vitória, seja no trabalho em equipe para capturar as bruxas ou nas estratégias para se esconder e enganar os caçadores. Além disso, o estilo visual leve e colorido, com uma atmosfera encantadora, adiciona um toque de charme ao jogo.

Se você procura uma experiência descontraída e cheia de risadas, Witch It é uma excelente opção para se divertir com amigos e testar suas habilidades de esconderijo e caça.

🔹 Nota pessoal: 8/10 – Um jogo de esconde-esconde criativo e divertido, com um toque de fantasia e muita interação entre os jogadores.

[b]Watch Dogs 2[/b] не може похвалитися ні видатною фізикою, ні захопливою стрільбою. Проте гра компенсує це непоганим стелсом і доволі цікавим відкритим світом.

[b]Сан-Франциско[/b] виглядає яскраво та різноманітно — недарма художники [b]Ubisoft[/b] одні з найкращих у індустрії. Місто наповнене різноманітними локаціями та точками інтересу, які приємно досліджувати.

Сюжет, прямо скажемо, на рівні кіно для дорослих, але часом зустрічаються дійсно веселі моменти. Якщо не сприймати гру надто серйозно, вона здатна подарувати свою порцію задоволення. | JOGASSO E RECOMENDO MUITO EM PROMOÇÃO.

- O jogo graficamente é lindo
- A historia é BOA tirando uma parte na qual a Ubisoft errou em não dar tanta importância a algo que acontece na historia
- A personalidade de cada personagem principal é boa e unica
- Os puzzle são prazerosos de fazer, 
- As armas são equilibradas com respectivo preço
- Roda de habilidades é diversificada com seu estilo de jogo: Stealth ou Combate
- Jumper e Drone são duas mecânicas que encaixaram perfeitamente na gameplay
- Mal teve bugs ou crashs jogando

狗2前期给人感觉不佳，新主角和队友都是些街头嘻哈风格人物，人物和对抗敌对势力的缘由都不如前作丰满。前期主线、支线任务也有不少嘻哈搞怪恶作剧风格的内容，如果是喜欢前作严肃风格的玩家会感觉比较幼稚。

不过从中期开始主角团逐渐专心对抗反派势力给人的感觉就越来越好。尤其是后期黑入人造卫星网络，在大气层外攻击全球关键设施的任务是一个极其优秀的高潮，确实能让人感觉到这个IP 作为黑客和现实主义题材的爽点。

由于本作主题不同于前作个人的复仇，而是对现代科技被掌权者滥用的反叛，使得本作题材更加深刻和更具现实意义。

在玩法上由于不是AC，主角攀爬性能较弱，因此初期有很大局限令人不爽。不过中期解锁各种能力后会逐渐流畅起来，纵使化身狂战士物理黑入也绝无不可，事实上正是这种"也可硬刚“的设计才是真正的自由度，而不是一味追求”必须潜行“。

作为”育碧旅游“项目，本作也极其优秀地刻画了旧金山主要地形结构和著名景观，在游览的同时可以肆意飚车大开杀戒而不用担心肉身旅游时被别人大开杀戒，幸甚乐哉。 | ---{ Графика }-—

[h3] Overall Opinion [/h3] 

Came for the plot, stuck around for the plot. Overall it provided enough for me to review this positively with a few caveats. Also should you get this game I recommend for going in blind for the first couple of endings, as it enhances the experience.  A DLC is also in the works, if that affects your decision though it's something to consider. I'd wait for a sale, or if money isn't an issue and you like this type of game then consider a purchase to be well worth it.

[h3] The Good [/h3] 

The greatest strength of the game is the plot itself, the intrigue around the deceased patriarch and maids who are more than meets the eye. The quantity of endings will ensure that your first few playthroughs are distinct, though not all are created equally. Additionally aspects of the story remain locked behind certain paths, so your perspective of the plot can shift from your first couple of playthroughs. An example is [b] Spoiler [/b]: [spoiler] on my first playthrough I ended up focusing on Reiko and Misaki thus missing out on the fact that Umeko was a part of the secret police tasked to spy on you, which I learned in my second playthrough as she got me a bad ending. [/spoiler] The tasteful scenes are high quality and happen often enough to keep things interesting, with some scenes being a reward a given endings to make them more meaningful.

[h3] The Bad [/h3] 

For a game to have so many endings, some naturally arise from contrivances where minute matters that shouldn't change the outcome does. Not all endings suffer from this fate, however, when it does happen you'll notice. The game is also short,  my first playthrough clocking in at roughly 2 hours, so the cost/playtime may or may not be worth it depending on the person. | Vrai Bon visual Novel avec une Vrai histoire avec de Vrai rebondissement si vous faite toute les fin. | Boring Anime trash. There is nothing interesting about it but to torture the reader to some backwards way of thinking. I fell asleep reading this garbage, looking at the same boring style Anime faces of bug eyed children. This foreign made trash is proof all those Asian countries suck. I hate you developers and artists of this kind of cheap boring garbage peddled into this country for a quick buck. BAD GAME! | I am recommending this game - barely - with a rating of 5 out of 10.

* It is mildly entertaining for about a 10 hour play through the "Good" endings.
* You must follow the guides to do this since the paths to these good endings are not intuitive. There are 22 endings, but only 8 of them are good.
* The Eastern culture reflected in the game is quite different from Western culture. It can be hard to understand and accept from the Western viewpoint, and this detracts from enjoyment.
* The female servants accept their submission unquestionably and matter-of-factly. This is quite unbelievable actually.
* "Punishment" takes the form of sexual molestation. This can be a little cringe worthy since it is unrealistic. I could appreciate some real BDSM - even non-consensual - but this is more like a weird fantasy.
* There is no harem ending. You go through the many choices to end up with one of the maids in a very vanilla ending.
* The graphics are bare minimum - a background painting with a foreground of the current maid(s) being interacted with. | 这个题材非常好，瑟瑟的剧情也不错。

Didn't think music would be that good, game all around would be an 8/10 for me,  after playing it, not just seeing gameplay. Unfortunate that the game does not have achievements. | ~Análise de alguém que jogou quase nenhum jogo relacionado à esportes e com um pc de batata ~

Pontos positivos e análise geral:

Jogo absurdamente bem otimizado, de forma que pude jogar com os melhores gráficos sem erros. A jogabilidade é muito simples, no começo é UM POUCO complicado de se adaptar, o que aumenta a imersão dentro do contexto do jogo. Assim que você pega o jeito (fato que não demora nada para acontecer), se torna extremamente relaxante, mas NADA cansativo ou estressante, muito pelo contrário. As missões não são repetitivas, na verdade elas ficam cada vez mais desafiadoras e se torna uma aventura extraordinária, dentro do jogo tem playlists de músicas separadas por gênero musical e eu achei isso incrível. Os movimentos são dinâmicos e suaves, as instruções são bastante claras e explicadas de forma que qualquer um consegue compreender claramente, ESTÁ DUBLADO, e ainda por cima você  é bastante livre dentro do jogo. Ele não te prende dentro do percurso de uma missão: é mundo aberto, ao mesmo tempo que você não corre o risco de se perder enquanto esquia, tendo a liberdade de reiniciar quando bem entender sem sofrer penalidades. Você pode trocar o equipamento como bem entender, assim como modificar a câmera do jogo e alternar entre primeira pessoa e terceira pessoa, aparentemente também tem algum suporte para VR (posso estar enganado quanto a isso). 

PONTOS NEGATIVOS: Não há como mudar isso, mas a questão de acessar a conta da ubsoft é extremamente frustrante. Acabei criando uma nova conta para acessar sendo que já tinha outra, o que não faz sentido já que compramos o jogo e queremos jogá-lo, apenas. O fato de termos que ter todo cuidado com a conta para não perdermos o jogo todo (sem direito a reembolso por isso) me assusta um bocado, e ficar esperando o menu da ubsoft me tira a vontade de jogar. Tirando isso, dentro do game há apenas uma coisa que não gostei, em dado momento quando começamos a esquiar algumas montanhas, o jogo insere diálogos como se a montanha estivesse contando sua história para você. Acredito que a maioria das pessoas acharia brilhante, mas não me emocionou de nenhuma forma, eu queria poder desabilitar essa narração que não muda nada para curtir as músicas sem perder algum diálogo importante, é realmente um longo monólogo que não me fez sentir nada além de raiva. Tirando isso, jogasso.

EM SUMA, é um jogo bonito e muito bem otimizado, para quem quer relaxar sem perder a ansiedade de se aventurar, gráficos espetaculares, trilha sonora perfeita, imersão fora do comum, missões bem construídas, dublado, desafiador, mecânicas fáceis de se habituar e que fazem sentido dentro do jogo, muito legal mesmo, apenas a burocracia da ubsoft que é no mínimo desanimadora. | Хорошая игра с приятными видами и неплохой музыкой. Однако, очень сильно разочаровывает кривое управление, особенно, парапланом. 

В общем, для игры Юбиков - неплохо. Зайти почиллить можно, время от времени. | игра мега атмосферная, можно с друзьями и можно одному катать и изучать местность. если кратко, то игра имба | Ubisoft is dirt. Have to two-factor authenticate yourself to play a single player title in single player mode. You can play "offline" if you want, but have access to no challenges, no in-game music, no nothing. It's basically a freeroam with no content unless you're connected to their servers. It's a fun game when you want to zone out, but every time I buy a Ubisoft game, I'm 100% disappointed with the depth of probing they must do just to enjoy a game. I should be able to fire it up offline and be able to do whatever. Whatever. I knew what I was doing when I bought it.

don't let this game die | Good concept.  Wayyy Wayyy Wayyy too much non-skippable cut screens.  Way too long load screen crap.  Load Me in to the match and let me play.  Show rewards in a non-intrusive way and let me get on with the next match. | [b]Atenção! Os servidores do jogo foram desligados. A análise abaixo fala do jogo antes do ocorrido.[/b]

Falando de aspectos superficiais, o jogo é leve e super bem otimizado, gráficos bonitos e focados em neon-style, possui um bom ping e é totalmente em português, incluindo as falas. A jogabilidade é extremamente fluida, muito bom de se jogar. Tem até um mapa do Rio de Janeiro e equipes de lá pra optar jogar também (Bossa e Samba). Pode ser jogado tanto no teclado e mouse como no controle. Não há problema algum em jogar com o teclado, apesar de recomendarem o uso do controle.

O jogo é um eSport onde duas equipes de 2 ou 3 competidores combatem entre si. Você, como competidor, deve passar por cima de ativadores de lasers (nós). Com isso, o laser é ativado e fica da cor da sua equipe. Se um adversário bater no laser, ele morre temporariamente até um outro adversário revivê-lo. O objetivo é eliminar todos os adversários por meio de contato com seus lasers (seja por falta de reflexo deles ou induzidos por sua equipe; vou explicar logo abaixo).

Há vários cenários e mapas de lasers. Um cenário é o ambiente (favela, megaplex, stadium, etc). O mapa de lasers é o padrão dos lasers que se movem no cenário: eles podem mover-se rapidamente, criar formas, contorcer, etc. Um mesmo cenário pode usar diferentes mapas de lasers.

Nos cenários, a cada minuto, surgem DROP SKILLS: são quadrados brancos que quando você passa em cima, realizam um evento no cenário como desativar todos os lasers, inverter os lasers, roubar lasers de adversários, atordoar todos, cercar o mapa, etc. É um elemento estratégico muito importante e você deve saber bem quando usá-lo ou se defender do uso do adversário.

Existem várias classes no jogo, cada uma com uma ação específica para conduzir um ataque ou ajudar na defesa do seu time. Crie combinações de classes com sua equipe pra ter a parte ofensiva e defensiva. A ação de sua classe só pode ser feita de tempo em tempo (há um tipo de barra de energia que zera e recarrega quando você usa a ação de sua classe). Resumindo as classes e suas ações:

[list]
    [*][b]Batedor:[/b] tem um escudo que empurra os adversários na direção apontada. Uso ofensivo (empurrar jogadores em lasers) ou defensivo (afastar jogadores de um local).
    [*][b]Fantasma:[/b] Fica invulnerável a lasers e habilidades por alguns instantes, atravessando-os. Ofensivo para chegar em locais inalcançáveis ou defensivo para reviver equipe ou ativar sorrateiramente os lasers.
    [*][b]Ladrão:[/b] Cria uma áurea ao seu redor e qualquer nó de laser que encostar em sua áurea vira um nó de laser da sua equipe.
    [*][b]Atirador:[/b] Possui uma orb que, quando ativa, deixa um rastro do local que foi ativada até onde você andar. Ao explodir a orb, você retorna ao local em que o rastro foi iniciado e qualquer adversário encostando em seu rastro na hora da explosão será eliminado.
    [*][b]Choque:[/b] Cria um campo de choque ao ativar a habilidade. Qualquer adversário em contato com o campo de choque é atordoado por instantes. Pode usar pra se defender de ofensivas ou atordoar alguém enquanto um laser se aproxima, eliminando-o.
    [*][b]Lâmina:[/b] Possui uma espada que elimina instantaneamente qualquer adversário que for atingido em seu dash ofensivo, mas é bem fácil errar e ser counterado.
[/list]

O jogo possui skins, emojis, texturas para lasers, portraits, etc. Tudo é obtido ao evoluir seu nível no jogo. Não há nada pay-to-win, é tudo cosmético (e são bem bonitos). A equipe de suporte do jogo é ativa e escuta a comunidade, sempre tem atualizações. O jogo possui um ranking modular (há o ranking de EXP total e ranking por classe). Há um tutorial do jogo, apesar que você pega a mecânica em poucos instantes: é um jogo fácil de aprender mas difícil de dominar, requer muita habilidade e cooperação com seu time. Possui multiplayer local também pra jogar sem internet.

Ein einfaches Golf Spiel bei dem man wie im RL den Ball durch verschiedene Bahnen ins Loch schlagen muss.
Dabei hat man bereits fertiggestellte Maps vom Spiel selber oder kann sich im Workshop Maps runterladen, die von Spielern erstellt wurden (aktuell fast 20k Maps zur Auswahl). Die Anzahl der Löcher variieren je nach Level, doch die ,,feste'' Anzahl ist bei 18 Löchern. Die Maps sind alle unterschiedlich gestaltet vom Aufbau, Schwierigkeitsgrad & Kreativität her. Es gibt auch ein paar Troll Maps, die das ganze noch witziger gestalten (meiner Meinung mach).
Generell fand ich die bisher gespielten Maps alle richtig gut, vor allem da sie mit Freunden sehr viel Spaß gebracht haben.
Das Spiel bietet meiner Meinung nach eine große Vielfalt an Möglichkeiten an, da man neben den ganzen Workshop Maps auch unterschiedliche Spielmodi auswählen kann, für sich selber die Einstellungen was Schläge, Zeit etc. angeht ändern & man kann sowohl Solo, als auch im Multiplayer oder auch im VR Modus spielen.
Am besten spielt man mit Kollision an, damit man seine Freunde auch so ein wenig nerven kann :D

Alles in allem kann ich das Spiel nur empfehlen! | The best mini golf game available, with a vibrant map making community. I believe Pikuniku stands out the most in terms of its gameplay style. It has a very unique and interesting style, as its graphics, dialogues, and even the way the in-game sport, baskick, is integrated into the main storyline make it special. What's particularly fun is that baskick can be played with a friend in offline multiplayer mode, making it a great party game as well.

The game's graphics fit perfectly with its style, though they are not the main focus, which means it can run smoothly even on a low-end "potato" PC. The dialogues are excellently written, and the characters are hilarious. One of the best things about the game, in my opinion, is the ability to play with a friend, whether it's the aforementioned baskick tournament or shorter levels designed for co-op gameplay.

Another impressive aspect of the game is the movement of NPCs. Their animations are so well done that they almost feel like real players. This is especially noticeable during the baskick tournament or when you start kicking an NPC—after a while, they will even fight back!

Overall, I think Pikuniku is a fantastic and entertaining game that is definitely worth its price. | ---{ Графика }-—

I’m not really sure what I was thinking, especially since I can’t even draw a stick figure, but hey, it’s a great game. 10/10 would recommend. | i bought this game when I was about 15 years old and i have no idea what i was thinking i don't even know how to draw i'm the opposite of artistic my drawings are on a first grade level | This game works best with a digital pencil and a drawing tablet!
10/10 Made some real masterpieces in this! | Das Spiel ist seltsam. 40 min gespielt und an sich ist nichts passiert. Da kann man die Zeit besser mit Krita verbringen und tatsächlich was malen, also mit richtigen Pinseln, Werkzeugen, Ebenen, Farbmischungen usw. Das Spiel hier scheint lediglich darin zu bestehen, Bilder zu verkaufen - in der Hoffnung man trifft den Geschmack der Kunden. Und irgendwann - ja wann denn eigentlich endlich? - ein paar Werkzeuge dazu zu kaufen. Und dann damit weiter zu machen, wie zuvor. 

Ich bin gespannt, ob der zweite Teil etwas mehr Inhalt bietet. (den Rezensionen nach wohl leider auch nicht) | A relaxing experience

It was fun to paint and paint in the beginning, but got too repetitive later

Not worth the full price (if you don't have patience to paint and paint with no action like me), it's fun to return to the game once in a while and paint characters from new games you play, buy if it's on sale

马上全成就了，作为较为早期的FMV作品，夜班讲述了一个盗窃古董、计中计，反转后再反转的故事。
情节还是比较紧凑的，而且总的来说故事架构还可以，演员表演也可圈可点，当然细节方面有待优化。

但是有几个致命的不足，使这游戏的水准急剧降低。无论是剧情党还是成就党都会玩的十分痛苦。
其一，是不能选择章节，也不允许跳过剧情，通关后就只能重新开始。而这游戏又偏偏有好几个结局。这在现代游戏中是不可想象的，可以算是最恶心的设计了。
第二，这游戏每个选项都是定时的，但是又强调微小的选择导致截然不同的结果。而且很多选项带来的后果其实是不可预知的，也没有任何提示。有的选项你以为会导致严重后果，其实并没有。反而是一些看似没啥关系的选项，会导致剧情的改变。为什么不留给玩家足够的思考时间呢？
第三，其实游戏很多地方是偷工减料的。能决定结局的就那么少数几个选项，很多选择只是会让过场动画不同，然后剧情导向都是一样的。搞出那么多选项有点误导的成分。 | 剧情还是很不错的，忘了打折多少钱买的了，便宜的话还是很值得买的 | Well it's better then watching a movie. Because you can control the story line. i recommend buying. | Me gusta por la interacción con un trama simple pero no aburrida, marcando la tensión en cada decisión. Lo unico malo, es no poder saltearte los creditos finales cuando lo rejugas de nuevo. | It's a fun story, but the lack of a skip button makes it almost unreplayable. Worth playing once or twice, but not really worth doing a 100% (haven't done it myself).

还挺好玩的，玩得久了还挺上头的，游戏具备多样性，游戏本体占用空间却不大，可以说是小游戏，但却可以算是大作。虽然关卡分支比较少，也比较容易似，但是整体玩起来还是挺有意思的。一失足成千古恨的玩法警醒玩家更加珍惜生命，而竞速的奖励方式则告诫玩家要珍惜时间；辅助模式的加入则让玩家拥有了更多的调节空间。本人实力不济尚未通关，但在不断尝试中一点点推进也充分具备苦中作乐的趣味。 | Игра на 10/10, боль, страдания, смерти в самом конце, разнообразие на высшем уровне, всем рекомендую, одна из самых лучших 2D игр в мире, столько контента, столько злых и счастливых эмоций, по поводу вариативности нет слов, а графика просто блеск | 有没有和我一样小时候在电视频道上看到过，当时特别想玩，算是圆了童年的梦，但是也确实是好玩 | One of the best roguevanias i've ever played, even though i'm not much of a metroidvania fan.

Game has tons of unlockables and has a colaboration with every single indie under the sun. Also the game sort of fixes one of the main problems roguelikes have, which is getting your run going after a loss by giving you incentives and bonuses for completing the start of levels fast.

Whilst i'm not a big fan of this game, i can praise it for how good it is.
Roguelike-wise, you can get some ultra busted runs, and has a lot of roguelite elements as progression with the shop.
the game isn't that unforgiving, and it strikes a perfect balance between being ruthless and forgiving at the same time.

I give this game a 9.5/10. | Dead Cells is a really fun action-roguelike game that I truly enjoyed playing and completing for the first time. I have always loved metroidvanias (such as Hollow Knight) and roguelikes (such as TBOI), and this game really gave me the enjoyment I got from both games. Each run feels rewarding to find and collect new items you have never seen before. As for the DLC, I feel as if it has sufficient content but is slightly overpriced and you should only buy it on sale with the DLC bundle deal. I am more than satisfied with the post-completion content that this game offers, including 6 difficulty settings and many areas to explore. [b] This truly is a 10/10 for me, you should buy Dead Cells [/b].

such a cute game. I love the style and graphics of it and it is very fun to play. but i did have one issue when i used a controler for it the right trigger never worked again this happened to two controlers | Parkasaurus is a really great game that could entertain many different demographics.

I would recommend Parkasaurus!
